modes.name: Elimination
modes.description: Compete as a team of six players in a series of fights, where successful heroes are removed from later rounds.
modes.label: Daily

modes.name: Quick Play Classic
modes.description: Defeat the enemy team with no role limits on hero selection.

modes.name: Total Mayhem
modes.description: Power up and embrace the chaos.
modes.label: Daily

modes.name: Hero Gauntlet
modes.description: Play through a set list of heroes in a deathmatch environment. Each time you get a kill, you swap to the next hero. The first player to get through their list wins.
modes.label: Daily

modes.name: Mystery Heroes
modes.description: Defeat the enemy team with every player using heroes that randomly change upon respawn.
